Razkrivamo, kako do elektrike po nižjih cenah
Elektrika je ena najbolj uporabnih oblik energije, zato imamo tudi v Sloveniji močno razvejeno električno omrežje. Brez nje pravzaprav ne moremo. Pa veste, kako jo dobiti po najboljši ceni?
04 Nov 2019, 09:41 by P. I.
Električno energijo uporabljamo vsak dan; v pomoč nam je praktično na vsakem koraku in nam olajša marsikatero opravilo. Od nje so odvisni ogrevanje, razsvetljava, delovanje raznih naprav, tudi že avtomobilov. Pri izbiri ponudnika oziroma dobavitelja električne energije – na trgu jih je kar nekaj – imamo slovenski potrošniki popolnoma proste roke. Odločitev je, v nasprotju npr. z izbiro ponudnika telekomunikacijskih storitev, tudi povsem neodvisna od bivališča, volje sosedov ali upravnika večstanovanjske stavbe; vsi slovenski ponudniki električne energije pa lahko dobavo zagotavljajo povsod po Sloveniji.Zakaj je dobro, da imamo prosto izbiroLiberaliziran trg električne energije in s tem svobodna izbira potrošnikov spodbuja konkurenčnost med dobavitelji, posamezniku pa omogoča, da izbere tistega, čigar ponudba mu najbolj ustreza. Tudi tako, da pri mesečnih stroških prihrani. Prihranki namreč niso zanemarljivi, zlasti v gospodinjstvih, ki se na elektriko tudi ogrevajo ali z njo napajajo svoje avtomobile.Mesečna poraba električne energije je odvisna od velikosti stanovanja, števila članov gospodinjstva; števila električnih naprav, ki so dnevno v uporabi; vsekakor nekoliko tudi od varčnosti uporabnika ter cene za kWh, ki vam jo zagotavlja vaš izbrani dobavitelj.Menjava dobavitelja: hitro in brez težavSte našli ponudnika elektrike, ki se vam zdi bolj primeren, pa odlašate, da se izognete dolgim birokratskim postopkom? Ne skrbite, postopek je povsem preprost in tudi strah, da bi med menjavo ostali brez elektrike, je odveč. Za distribucijsko omrežje namreč skrbi neodvisen sistemski operater SODO, ki dobavo zagotavlja ne glede na izbranega dobavitelja.Vse potrebno za preklop bo ob predložitvi vaših osebnih podatkov in številke merilnega mesta za vas opravil vaš novi izbrani ponudnik. Po podpisu pogodbe vam bo sporočil, kdaj boste postali njegov odjemalec.Pri Petrolu so postopek preklopa še poenostavili. Odjemalec Petrol Elektrike namreč lahko postanete v treh preprostih korakih kar preko spleta. Pogodbo pa podpišete le s klikom, brez uporabe karšnih koli certifikatov. Za vse ostalo poskrbi Petrol.Glavno vprašanje: kako lahko prihranim?Z enim očesom pogledujete stanje na števcu, z drugim pa visok račun in se sprašujete, kako za elektriko plačevati manj? Rešitve so tri: omejite uporabo električnih naprav, spremenite življenjski slog ali zamenjajte dobavitelja električne energije.Pri tem je ključno, da izberete dobavitelja, ki se bo prilagoil vašemu življenjskemu slogu in vam omogočil kar največje mesečne prihranke. Petrol vam, na primer, prihranek zagotavlja že takoj ob preklopu, saj boste prvih šest mesecev za elektriko plačevali 10 % manj kot po rednem ceniku, na Petrol klub kartico pa prejeli 10 evrov dobrodošlice za naslednji nakup na bencinskem servisu. Kaj pa potem, se sprašujete? Vesela novica! Vaši računi bodo nižji tudi po izteku akcijske ponudbe. Prav vsak nakup na Petrolu, tudi plačilo položnic za elektriko, vam namreč prinaša Zlate točke, ki jih lahko unovčite za ta namen.

We are discovering how to get electricity at lower prices
Electricity is one of the most useful forms of energy, which is why we also have a highly branched electricity network in Slovenia. We can't really do without it. Do you know how to get it at the best price?
04 Nov 2019, 09:41 by P.I.
We use electricity every day; it helps us practically every step of the way and makes it easy for us to do many things. It depends on heating, lighting, operation of various appliances, including cars. When choosing a supplier or supplier of electricity - there are quite a few on the market - Slovenian consumers have completely free hands. The decision is contrary to e.g. by choosing a telecommunications service provider, also completely independent of the residence, will of the neighbors or the manager of the multi-apartment building; and all Slovenian electricity providers can supply all over Slovenia. It is good to have a free choice. The liberalized electricity market, thus free choice of consumers, promotes competitiveness among suppliers, enabling the individual to choose the one whose offer is best suited to him. Also, it saves on monthly expenses. The savings are not negligible, especially in households that also heat or power their cars with electricity. Monthly electricity consumption depends on the size of the dwelling, the number of household members; the number of electrical appliances used daily; certainly a little bit more than the user-friendliness and the kWh price your chosen supplier gives you. Changing your supplier: quickly and without difficultyDo you find a suitable electricity provider that you prefer to avoid long bureaucratic procedures? Don't worry, the process is simple and the fear of running out of electricity is unnecessary. The distribution network is managed by an independent system operator, SODO, who guarantees the supply regardless of the selected supplier. After signing the contract, he will let you know when you will become his client. At Petrol, the switchover process was simplified. Namely, you can become a Petrol Electricity customer in three easy steps online. However, you can only sign the contract by clicking, without using any certificates. The main question is: how can I save money? With one eye you look at the balance on the meter and the other with a high bill and wonder how to pay less for electricity? There are three solutions: limit your use of electrical appliances, change your lifestyle, or change your electricity supplier. In doing so, it is crucial to choose a supplier that will adapt to your lifestyle and maximize your monthly savings. For example, Petrol provides you with savings immediately when you switch, as you will pay 10% less for the first six months than electricity at the regular price list, and receive a $ 10 welcome credit card for your next Petrol Club purchase. What about then, you wonder? Good news! Your bills will be lower even after the offer expires. Every purchase on Petrol, including the payment of electricity bills, gives you Golden Points that you can redeem for this purpose.
